typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		BusinessEntityID as string,
		QuotaDate as string,
		SalesQuota as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(SalesQuota = toInteger(SalesQuota)) ~> ModifyColumns1
ModifyColumns1 aggregate(groupBy(BusinessEntityID),
	SalesQuota = sum(SalesQuota)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
